author: antelder
msg: Allow starting an empty node (with no contributions) so its possible to configure and start a shared endpoint registry that gets reused by subsequent nodes taht are started with the in-VM scheme

author: antelder
msg: Change the Registry factory to not use the full config uri when its the tuscany: scheme so that the registry itself can control how the registry gets shared amoung nodes. (I think we need to review all the core approach to creating/locating/sharing endpoint registries, I'll start a ML thread about this once I've got something more complete working)
